## 📄 Command Output
Please share the output of these diagnostic commands:

**Python Version:**
```bash
python --version
# or
python3 --version
```

**Node.js Version:**
```bash
node --version
npm --version
```

**Docker Status** (if using Docker):
```bash
docker --version
docker-compose --version
docker info
```

**Environment Detection:**
```bash
python scripts/environment-manager.py --config
```
